title: 开服一个月 终于攒到钱买XS MAX了
author: gouy
txt_content: 哎努力了15天 终于攒到钱换手机了 好开心

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: 你有点膨胀了兄dei

replies.author: qq2219978145
replies.txt_content: 牛逼嗷，兄弟

replies.author: Thismyshenzhi
replies.txt_content: 开了15天就买了个XS你有点牛

replies.author: TNTcraftHIM
replies.txt_content: 有点厉害的啊兄弟，开服一个月能攒钱买xs max那服务器肯定不小

replies.author: PLA代政
replies.txt_content: 这位兄弟厉害
这有点厉害！才15天就xs max了？

replies.author: sulinly
replies.txt_content: 牛人哦 啥子服？

replies.author: shi1102347423
replies.txt_content: 虽然大兄弟有点厉害，但是还是希望能够将更多精力放在服务器中 更好完善服务器的

replies.author: CropSuck
replies.txt_content: 呵呵，好厉害啊哦

replies.author: CropSuck
replies.txt_content: 呵呵，好厉害啊哦

replies.author: sgoye
replies.txt_content: 传说中的圈钱服务器？

replies.author: RMBQAQ
replies.txt_content: 15天牛逼了兄弟 玩家家里是有矿吗

replies.author: huxiaojie
replies.txt_content: woc  大哥啊  15天就买了？

replies.author: 韦云升
replies.txt_content: 我们只还能用着诺基亚老年机

replies.author: zzb186
replies.txt_content: 你不是快餐服务器吧。。如果不是的话，加油，祝你做大，然后把服务器QQ群发出来，让我们体验一下你的服务器？

replies.author: XTxiaodada
replies.txt_content: 你就是月亮岛的腐竹？！

replies.author: armadillo
replies.txt_content: 牛逼啊，估计你这个服有点东西

replies.author: Eaxl
replies.txt_content: 一个吸引的标题引来无数人哈

replies.author: Eaxl
replies.txt_content: 加油好好努力  你服务器我玩了挺不错

replies.author: AzureZeng
replies.txt_content:
可以的，这很牛逼
普通玩家做不到系列

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 抛开性价比和系统不谈，始终不清楚XS MAX的特点在哪里，哪里值得买

replies.author: 三黄走地鸡
replies.txt_content: 怎么捞的钱，nb啊

replies.author: 权子
replies.txt_content: 豪 气 值... 15天怎么赚的
